TFT13_GoopBuff_UltimateHero.DescriptionTra: After @NumRounds@ rounds, star up a 3-star 1-cost champion to 4 stars!

TFT13_GoopBuff_Knockout.DescriptionTra: Gain @BonusAD*100@% Attack Damage. The next attack after casting gains @BonusCrit*100@% Critical Strike Chance and deals @TrueDamagePercent*100@% true damage.

TFT13_GoopBuff_ShareYourEnergy.DescriptionTra: Combat start: grant @PercentStatsToShare*100@% of their Attack Damage, Ability Power, Health, Armor, and Magic Resist to adjacent allies.

TFT13_GoopBuff_Fortified.DescriptionTra: Gain @HealthPercent*100@% max Health. Every @ReapplyTimer@ seconds, gain another @HealthGrow*100@% (up to @StackCap@ times).

TFT13_GoopBuff_ComebackStory.DescriptionTra: Gain @DamageAmp*100@% Damage Amp for every @PerHealthAmount@ player health you have lost this game.

TFT13_GoopBuff_TitanicStrikes.DescriptionTra: Attacks deal an additional @ADRatio*100@% Attack Damage to the target and adjacent enemies.

TFT13_GoopBuff_Stoneskin.DescriptionTra: Combat start: Gain @BonusArmorMR@ Armor and Magic Resist. Every second, reduce this bonus by @ArmorMRLossPerSecond@.

TFT13_GoopBuff_TheFinisher.DescriptionTra: This champion's attacks and Ability executes enemy champions at @ExecutePercent*100@% health or lower.

TFT13_GoopBuff_Bulwark.DescriptionTra: Gain @BonusArmor@ Armor & @BonusMR@ Magic Resist. Triple it when above @HealthThreshold@% health.

TFT13_GoopBuff_HardenedMind.DescriptionTra: This champion gains @PctBonusResists@% more Armor and Magic Resist from all sources.

TFT13_GoopBuff_CosmicRhythm.DescriptionTra: No longer gain Mana but instead cast their Ability every @NumSeconds@ seconds.

TFT13_GoopBuff_Fireball.DescriptionTra: For every @ManaSpent@ Mana spent, throw a @HexRadius@-hex fireball that deals @HPRatio*100@% max Health true damage and <TFTKeyword>Burns</TFTKeyword> for @Duration@ seconds.

TFT13_GoopBuff_NothingWasted.DescriptionTra: When an ally dies, gain @ManaPercent*100@% of their current Mana.

TFT13_GoopBuff_SlimeTime.DescriptionTra: Every @Period@ seconds, deal @APRatio*100@% (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage in a 1-hex radius and heal this champion for @HealRatio*100@% of damage dealt.

TFT13_GoopBuff_MageArmor.DescriptionTra: Gain Armor and Magic Resist equal to @PercentAPToDefenses*100@% of Ability Power.

TFT13_GoopBuff_Dragonsoul.DescriptionTra: This champion's first attack against a new target fires a Dragonsoul blast, dealing @PercentHPDamage*100@% max Health true damage.

TFT13_GoopBuff_Freestyling.DescriptionTra: Gain @PercentDamage*100@% Damage Amp for each activated non-unique trait you have.

TFT13_GoopBuff_ScuttleFamiliar.DescriptionTra: On death, summon a crab with @PctOfDefensiveStats@% of their maximum Health, Armor, and Magic Resist.

TFT13_GoopBuff_DeftHands.DescriptionTra: Gain @MiniCount@ minis that deal @PercentAD*100@% (%i:scaleAD%) Attack Damage every @AttackCadence@ attacks. Their attacks reduce Armor by @ArmorReduction@.

TFT13_GoopBuff_LegacyOfShurima.DescriptionTra: After @Duration@ seconds of combat, ascend, gaining @MaxHPRatio*100@% max Health and @ASRatio*100@% Attack Speed

TFT13_GoopBuff_HungerForPower.DescriptionTra: Combat start: Consume the nearest ally and gain @HealthAndADPercent@% of their Health and Attack Damage.

TFT13_GoopBuff_EssenceofNavori.DescriptionTra: Max mana reduced by @PercentMana*100@%, increased by @PercentMana*100@% each time this champion casts (up to @PercentMana*400@%).

TFT13_GoopBuff_EvenInDeath.DescriptionTra: On first death, revive to full Health, gain @BonusAttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed and @BonusOmnivamp*100@% Omnivamp but lose @PercentHealthLoss*100@% Health each second.

TFT13_GoopBuff_CenteroftheUniverse.DescriptionTra: Gain @NumStars@ stars that orbit this champion. Each star deals @MissileDamage@ magic damage and the orbit expands to hit the champion's current target.

TFT13_GoopBuff_PowerAbsorption.DescriptionTra: Gain @UpfrontAD*100@% Attack Damage. Each time an ally dies, gain @BonusAD*100@% of their Attack Damage.

TFT13_GoopBuff_CullTheWeak.DescriptionTra: Gain up to @CritPercent*100@% Critical Strike Chance based on target's missing Health. Every @Period@ seconds, target the lowest percent Health enemy in range.

TFT13_GoopBuff_EnergyAbsorption.DescriptionTra: Gain @UpfrontAP@ Ability Power. Each time an ally dies, gain @BonusAP*100@% of their Ability Power.

TFT13_GoopBuff_ArcanaOverwhelming.DescriptionTra: Gain %i:scaleAP% Ability Power equal to @MRPercent*100@% of Magic Resist. Gain @BonusMR@ Magic Resist.

TFT13_GoopBuff_AvalancheofArmor.DescriptionTra: Gain %i:scaleAD% Attack Damage equal to @ArmorPercent*100@% of Armor. Gain @BonusArmor@ %i:scaleArmor% Armor.

TFT13_GoopBuff_CallingCard.DescriptionTra: Gain an emblem that matches a non-unique trait from this champion.

TFT13_GoopBuff_Invisibility.DescriptionTra: Every @StealthTimer@ seconds, turn invisible for @StealthDuration@ second. The next attack has @BonusCrit*100@% Critical Strike Chance.

TFT13_GoopBuff_DramaticEntrance.DescriptionTra: Combat start: Leap off the battlefield. After @Delay@ seconds, arrive with @IncreasedMaxHealthPercent*100@% increased max Health and <TFTKeyword>Stun</TFTKeyword> all enemies for @StunDuration@ seconds.

TFT13_GoopBuff_GiantSized.DescriptionTra: Gain @BonusHP@ Health and grow greatly in size.

TFT13_GoopBuff_DeepRoots.DescriptionTra: Gain @BonusHealth@ Health, @BonusArmor@ Armor, and @BonusMagicResist@ Magic Resist. They cannot move or be stunned, and pull their target into range.

TFT13_GoopBuff_EagleEye.DescriptionTra: Gain +@BonusRange@ Range. Every @Time@ seconds this champion doesn't move, gain @BonusAD*100@% Attack Damage.

TFT13_GoopBuff_IntoTheUnknown.DescriptionTra: This champion disappears for @NumRounds@ rounds. When they return, they gain @GainedAP@ Ability Power and @GainedAD*100@% Attack Damage.

TFT13_GoopBuff_LaserEyes.DescriptionTra: Constantly deal @PercentAP*100@% Ability Power magic damage per second in a 3-hex line and <TFTKeyword>Burn</TFTKeyword> enemies for @BurnDuration@ seconds.

TFT13_GoopBuff_Miniaturize.DescriptionTra: Transform into an item that gives @PercentStats*100@% of their Attack Damage, Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. Equipped items pop off.

TFT13_GoopBuff_MagicTraining.DescriptionTra: Gain @BonusAP@ Ability Power. On cast, your team gains @APPerStack@ Ability Power for every @PerManaSpent@ Mana spent.

TFT13_GoopBuff_Headhunter.DescriptionTra: This champion gains @StartingAS@% Attack Speed. Every @NumKills@ kills, they permanently gain @StackingAS@% more (doubled in Hyper Roll). <TFTTrackerLabel>(Total Kills: @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT13_SetMechanic_EvolveBuff_Headhunter_CurrentKills@) </TFTTrackerLabel>

TFT13_GoopBuff_UnstoppableForce.DescriptionTra: On takedown, charge the next target and Stun them for @StunDuration@ seconds, then heal @PctHealthHeal@% max Health.

TFT13_GoopBuff_OneThousandCuts.DescriptionTra: Attacks deal @BaseTrueDamage@ bonus true damage, plus @BonusTrueDamage@ true damage for each time the target was damaged by this effect.

TFT13_GoopBuff_AvariceIncarnate.DescriptionTra: Gain @GoldCount@ gold. Gain @FlatPercentDamage@% Damage Amp and @PercentDamage*100@% more per @GoldIncrement@ gold you have (up to @GoldCap@%).

TFT13_GoopBuff_Bully.DescriptionTra: Gain @BonusDamage*100@% Damage Amp, increased to 36% against units with a lower star level.

TFT13_GoopBuff_WolfFamiliars.DescriptionTra: Summon 2 untargetable wolves with @PercentAD*100@% of this champion's Attack Damage and @TooltipAS@ Attack Speed.

TFT13_GoopBuff_AllForOne.DescriptionTra: Gain @DamageAmp*100@% Damage Amp for each star level on your board. Three-star champions grant @ThreeStarBonus@% Damage Amp instead.

TFT13_GoopBuff_BerserkerRage.DescriptionTra: Gain @BonusAP@ Ability Power & @BonusAD@% Attack Damage. Triple it when below @HealthThreshold@% Health.

TFT13_GoopBuff_Hypervelocity.DescriptionTra: Gain @ASBonus*100@% Attack Speed. On cast, gain @ASOnCast*100@% stacking Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

TFT13_GoopBuff_TouchofFrost.DescriptionTra: Ability casts 20% <TFTKeyword>Chill</TFTKeyword> (reduce Attack Speed) enemies for @Duration@ seconds. When <TFTKeyword>Chilled</TFTKeyword> enemies die, they stun the nearest enemy for @StunDuration@ second.

TFT13_GoopBuff_SlowCooker.DescriptionTra: Every second, deal magic damage in a @HexRadiusBase@-hex radius equal to @HealthRatio*100@% of their max Health. Radius increases every @Period@ seconds.

TFT13_GoopBuff_Thornskin.DescriptionTra: Gain @BonusArmor@ Armor and @BonusMR@ Magic Resist. When damaged, deal @DamagePercent*100@% of the damage blocked to adjacent enemies as magic damage.

TFT13_GoopBuff_ShouldertheBurden.DescriptionTra: Combat Start and every @ShieldTimer@ seconds: Grant @PercentHealth*100@% max Health Shield to self and @AlliesNumber@ lowest health allies for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

TFT13_GoopBuff_MagicMind.DescriptionTra: This champion gains @PctBonusAP@% more Ability Power from all sources.

TFT13_GoopBuff_Repulsor.DescriptionTra: Gain @BonusAS*100@% Attack Speed. On cast, knock back their target if within @KnockbackRange@ hexes of them.

TFT13_GoopBuff_SharpenedMind.DescriptionTra: This champion gains @PctBonusAD@% more Attack Damage from all sources.

TFT13_GoopBuff_CertainDeath.DescriptionTra: On first cast, leap to enemies and stun in a @HexRadius@-hex radius for @StunDuration@ seconds and gain @BonusAS*100@% Attack Speed and @BonusOmnivamp*100@% Omnivamp.

TFT13_GoopBuff_StrengthTraining.DescriptionTra: Gain @BonusAD@% Attack Damage. Every @NumAttacks@ times they attack, your team gains @ADPerStack@% Attack Damage.

TFT13_GoopBuff_HeavyHitter.DescriptionTra: Attacks deal bonus physical damage equal to @HealthToDamagePercent*100@% of this champion's max Health. (Cooldown: @Cooldown@ seconds)

TFT13_GoopBuff_Hivemind.DescriptionTra: Gain a copy of the first champion this champion kills each player combat. Gain @DamageAmpPct@% Damage Amp.

TFT13_GoopBuff_DualWielding.DescriptionTra: Gain 2 completed items that fit this champion's role.
